login.username_required: Username must be at least 2 characters.
login.password_required: Password must be at least 8 characters.

register.username_required: Username must be at least 2 characters.
register.username_contain: Username can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores.
register.password_required: Password must be at least 8 characters.
register.password_contain: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter, one uppercase letter, one number, and one special character.
register.confirm_password_required: Confirm Password must be the same as Password.

landing.description: A personalized learning system integrated with AI
landing.hero_subtitle: Experience the future of education with our AI-powered personalized learning platform
landing.features_subtitle: Discover tools designed to enhance your educational experience
landing.ai_powered_description: Personalized content and recommendations powered by advanced artificial intelligence to optimize your learning path
landing.interactive_courses_description: Engaging multimedia courses with hands-on projects, quizzes, and real-world applications
landing.progress_tracking_description: Monitor your learning journey with detailed analytics and insights into your performance
landing.note_taking_description: Capture and organize your thoughts with our intuitive note-taking tools
landing.collaborative_description: Connect with peers, join study groups, and learn together in our interactive community
landing.mobile_friendly_description: Access your courses anytime, anywhere with our responsive design optimized for all devices
landing.expert_support_description: Get help from qualified instructors and AI assistants whenever you need guidance
landing.about_description: Notebok is a graduation thesis project that explores the integration of AI technology with modern educational methods. This platform demonstrates how personalized learning systems can adapt to individual learning styles, pace, and preferences to create more effective educational experiences.
landing.mission_description: To research and develop innovative AI-powered educational solutions that can enhance the learning process, making education more personalized, interactive, and accessible through modern technology.
landing.cta_description: Join thousands of learners who are already transforming their future with Notebok.

chat.ai_can_be_wrong: AI can be wrong, always verify the information.
chat.5: Handles long context with high speed
chat.8: One of the top Chinese models for multi-step reasoning
